song.title: Lord I Need You
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .A Dsus2 A Dsus
[1] . A Dsus2 A Lord I come, I confess .E4/G# F#m7 E/G# Dadd9 Bowing here I find my rest || . A Dsus2 A Without You I fall apart . A E/G# Dadd9 You're the one that guides my heart
[C] . A Dsus2 A E/G# Lord, I need You, oh I need You .F#m7 Dsus2 A E/G# Every hour I need You || . A5/C# D A Dsus2 My one defense, my righteousness . A E/G# A Dsus2 Oh God, how I need You
---
[2] . A Dsus2 A Where sin runs deep, Your grace is more . F#m7 E4/G# Dadd9 Where grace is found is where You are || . A Dsus2 A And where You are Lord I am free . E4/G# A Dsus2 Holiness is Christ in me
[B] . A5/D A5/C# E5/G# F#m7 So teach my song to rise to You . E/G# Dadd9 When temptation comes my way || . A5/D A5/C# E5/G# F#m7 And when I cannot stand I'll fall on You . E/G# A Jesus You're my hope and stay
